ai-anya-e0105n6:1_1: Then, firstly, when he said this to the teachers:
ai-anya-e0105n6:1_2: “I think that there is no place for striving at all—whether aristocrats, brahmins, or householders—they don’t know who is Buddha when they’re intoxicated with a Buddha,”
ai-anya-e0105n6:1_3: But it is worthy of the noble ones, unprofitable deeds, that is to say, the refuge (in Buddha),
ai-anya-e0105n6:1_4: For it is not possible that if a managed at intervals of a hypothesession about it, and you do not know it carefully.
ai-anya-e0105n6:1_5: Please not wait when the teacher comes to an end,
ai-anya-e0105n6:2_0: “Now is the time for the Elders, out of compassion for the Elders,
ai-anya-e0105n6:3_0: and having spent the rest of the Suvihāra which were prepared.”
ai-anya-e0105n6:4_0: Herein, the path here is this:
ai-anya-e0105n6:6_0: I will have purified the path of purity,” and if it is purified, he should see his purity.

ai-anya-e0105n6:12_1: In this way, it must be done, and which is why the instructions of the Buddhas, the origin of the world, the fully awakened Buddhas, out of compassion for the Faith.
